about.title: About Me
about.quote: ‚ùù The only way to do great work is to love what you do. ‚ùû
about.name: Ayman Orkhis
about.bio1: I am an AI & Data Science engineering student in my 3rd year at T√©l√©com SudParis, currently pursuing a Master's in Data Science at √âcole Polytechnique. I have a strong foundation in mathematics, machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and computer vision, with hands-on experience in Python, SQL, and frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn.
about.bio2: Through my previous internships and projects, I applied these skills to impactful challenges: medical image segmentation with advanced architectures (Mamba & MedNeXt), the development of language models for Indigenous languages of Canada using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and predictive real-estate modeling at Avito.ma. In each of these, I distinguished myself as a key contributor, with several works recognized by awards and prizes.
about.bio3: Autonomous, rigorous, and results-driven, I value clean code, reproducible experiments, and teamwork. I am fluent in French and English, strengthened by international experiences that enhanced my adaptability and cross-cultural collaboration.
